comments.author: mak@mozilla.com
comments.creator: mak@mozilla.com
comments.text: This likely requires a cheaper frecency algorithm, so we can bump it up both on page opening and closing (at this point we'd consider accumulated interaction). Your monotonic frecency solution may be a first good path to investigate, you should file your suggestion for the new algo.
comments.raw_text: This likely requires a cheaper frecency algorithm, so we can bump it up both on page opening and closing (at this point we'd consider accumulated interaction). Your monotonic frecency solution may be a first good path to investigate, you should file your suggestion for the new algo.
